product_summary: CodeGeeX is a versatile tool that offers a wide range of features for developers, including code generation, code completion, and documentation generation. It supports multiple programming languages, making it a valuable resource for developers of all skill levels.
product_pros: Can be used for a variety of tasks
product_cons: May not be suitable for all programming tasks
May not be compatible with all IDEs
May not be suitable for large projects

product_usecases.details: CodeGeeX can be used to generate code for a variety of programming tasks, such as creating new classes, methods, and functions.
CodeGeeX can be used to complete code as you type, which can help to speed up development and reduce errors.
CodeGeeX can be used to generate documentation for your code, which can help to improve code readability and understanding.
CodeGeeX supports a variety of programming languages, including Python, Java, C++, and JavaScript.
CodeGeeX is a valuable tool for developers of all skill levels, and can be used to improve productivity and efficiency.

product_toolfor.details: CodeGeeX is a tool that is specifically designed for developers, and offers a variety of features that can help to improve productivity and efficiency.
CodeGeeX can be used by students to learn new programming languages and concepts, and to complete coding assignments.
CodeGeeX can be used by teachers to teach programming concepts and to provide students with a tool that can help them to learn and practice.
CodeGeeX can be used by researchers to explore new programming techniques and to develop new tools and applications.
CodeGeeX can be used by hobbyists to learn new programming languages and to create their own projects.

product_pricing: CodeGeeX is available for free under the Apache 2.0 license.
